channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 国际汽联确认举报人就沙特阿拉伯和拉斯维加斯赛事对主席提出投诉

item.title: 共和党副州长马克-罗宾逊（Mark Robinson）和民主党总检察长乔希-斯坦恩（Josh Stein）在北卡罗来纳州初选中赢得提名，以接替任期届满的民主党州长罗伊-库珀（Roy Cooper）。
item.description:
BREAKING: Republican Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson and Democratic Attorney General Josh Stein have won the nominations in the North Carolina primary election to replace term-limited Democratic Gov. Roy Cooper. https://t.co/fDX3bo4w7V

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统和前总统唐纳德-特朗普已经开始赢得早期的胜利，使他们离11月的复赛越来越近。两人都在弗吉尼亚州和北卡罗来纳州获胜，拜登还在佛蒙特州和爱荷华州获胜。
item.description:
President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump have begun racking up early wins moving them closer to a November rematch. Both men won in Virginia and North Carolina and Biden also won in Vermont and Iowa. https://t.co/OUuKCUaCpz

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 北加州一家滑雪度假村的工作人员打开办公楼二层的一扇门，发现里面是一堵坚固的雪墙。该度假村位于 7000 英尺高的山区，是周四开始肆虐该地区的暴风雪中降雪量最大的地方。
item.description:
Staff at a Northern California ski resort opened a door on the second level of their office building to find a solid wall of snow. The resort is 7,000 feet high in the mountains and recorded the highest amounts of snow from the storm that began barreling into the region Thursday. pic.twitter.com/TSbbnhHj9M

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯间谍局长称反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼死于自然原因
item.description:

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美联社记者梅格-金纳德（Meg Kinnard）将在 "超级星期二 "为选民投票，敬请收看我们的海岸直播报道。
item.description:

item.title: 现在开始：随着初选活动最重要的一晚的展开，东海岸的第一批投票站即将关闭。请关注美联社的最新现场报道。

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 继美联航和美国航空采取类似举措后，达美航空也将托运行李费上调 17%。

item.title: 从阿拉斯加州、加利福尼亚州到佛蒙特州和弗吉尼亚州，16 个州和 1 个地区正在举行 "超级星期二 "选举。数百名代表岌岌可危，这是任何一个党派在任何一天的最大收获。
item.description:
Super Tuesday elections are being held in 16 states and one territory — from Alaska and California to Vermont and Virginia. Hundreds of delegates are at stake, the biggest haul for either party on any single day.

Here's what to know. https://t.co/u0HJPnnWBQ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 彼得-丁拉吉（Peter Dinklage）说，当你有机会在电影中亲吻雪莉-麦克莱恩（Shirley MacLaine）时，你一定要抓住。两人主演的新喜剧《美国梦想家》是在大流行病最严重的时期拍摄的。
item.description:
Peter Dinklage says when you get the chance to kiss Shirley MacLaine in a movie, you take it. The two star in the new comedy “American Dreamer,” which was filmed during the height of the pandemic. pic.twitter.com/nhkUHDbBIk

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 5, 2024

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）鼓励人们在这个 "超级星期二 "出去投票。尽管有几个月的猜测，但这位音乐巨星还没有宣布为2024年的总统竞选代言。
item.description:
Taylor Swift is encouraging people get out and vote this Super Tuesday.

Despite months of speculation, the music superstar hasn't announced an endorsement in the 2024 presidential race. https://t.co/u0f24tFMf4

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 尼古拉斯-加利茨内说，他为《玛丽与乔治》中的性爱场面感到自豪。他与朱丽安-摩尔（Julianne Moore）共同主演了这部英国历史剧。
item.description:
Nicholas Galitzine says he's proud of the sex scenes in "Mary & George." He stars alongside Julianne Moore in the British historical drama series. pic.twitter.com/vQIwOU9bER
